57997.en: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>What in the world was that!?<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57997.ja: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「いったい　なにごとだべ！？<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57997.ko: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 뭐야! 무슨 일이냐!?<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57997.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>到底发生什么事了？<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57997.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>到底發生什麼事了！？<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57998.en: <start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>Oh no... Hero Zankrone's Statue...<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57998.ja: <start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>「そんな……ザンクローネ様の像が……。<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57998.ko: <start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>: 이럴 수가…… 장크로네 님의 조각상이…….<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57998.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>怎么会……赞库罗尼大人的雕像……<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57998.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02007 _normal m00001>不會吧……桑克朗大人的雕像竟然……<stop_lip_animation n02007 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57999.en: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>A good day to you, everyone of Melsandy Village.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57999.ja: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「ごきげんよう　メルサンディ村の皆様。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57999.ko: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 안녕하신가, 메르상디 마을 여러분.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57999.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>梅尔桑蒂村的各位，你们好。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57999.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>梅爾桑蒂村的各位，你們好。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58000.en: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>...With eternal night comes the Witch Gretzel <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58000.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「……永遠の夜とともに 
　魔女グレイツェル　参りました<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58000.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: ……영원한 밤과 함께
　마녀 그레이첼 등장<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58000.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……魔女格雷策尔和
永远的黑夜一起登场了<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58000.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……魔女格蕾潔爾
和永遠的黑夜一起登場了<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58001.en:
<start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>You're the one Zankrone was talking about, the Witch
who sent those monsters into the village!!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58001.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「てめえが　ザンクローネ様の言ってた
　村に　化け物どもを送り込んだ
　魔女ヤローだか！！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58001.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 네놈이 장크로네 님이 말한
　괴물들을 마을로 보낸
　마녀로구나!!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58001.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>你就是赞库罗尼大人说的，
让怪物们到村子里来的
那个混蛋魔女吧！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58001.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>妳就是桑克朗大人說的，
讓怪物進到村子裡來的
那個混蛋魔女吧！！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58002.en: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Hehehe... You enjoyed my presents, I hope?<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58002.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「ウフフッ。私が贈った　プレゼント
　よろこんでいただけたかしら？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58002.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 우후훗. 내가 보낸 선물은
　마음에 들었어?<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58002.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>呵呵呵。
那可都是我的礼物，你们喜欢吗？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58002.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>呵呵呵！我送來的禮物
你滿意嗎？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58003.en:
<start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Did you say PRESEEENTS!? Do you know how many
villagers lost their lives because of you!!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58003.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「プレゼントだとぉおおおお！？ 
　てめえのせいで　どんだけ　村人が
　犠牲になったと思っとるだあ！！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58003.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 선물이라고오오오오!?
　네놈 때문에 얼마나 많은 마을 사람이
　희생됐는지 알아!?<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58003.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>你说那是礼物？
你知道你害死了多少村民吗！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58003.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>妳說那是禮物────！？ 
妳知道妳害死了
多少村民嗎！！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58004.en:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Ahh <heart> Bringing you joy makes me happy. From now on,
there'll be more and mooore fun to be had!<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58004.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「キャハ<heart>　よろこんでもらえて　うれしいわ。 
　これからも　もっと　も～っと
　楽しませてあげるッ！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58004.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 꺄하<heart> 마음에 들었다니 기쁜걸.
　앞으로도 더~ 많이
　즐겁게 해 줘야겠네!<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58004.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哈哈<heart>真高兴你们喜欢我的礼物。
我今后还会送给你们
更多更多有趣的礼物！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58004.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哈哈<heart>真高興你們喜歡我的禮物。 
我還要送給你們
更多更～多的禮物喔！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58005.en: <start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>I'm ain't afraid of someone like you!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58005.ja: <start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「お前なんか　こわくねえぞ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58005.ko: <start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 너 같은 건 무섭지 않아!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58005.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>我们才不怕你呢！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58005.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>我們才不怕妳呢！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58006.en:
<start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>We all got Hero Zankrone! When we call him, he always
comes running for us!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58006.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「オレたちには　ザンクローネ様がいる！
　ザンクローネ様は　呼べば
　必ず　駆けつけてくれるんだ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58006.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 우리에겐 장크로네 님이 있어!
　장크로네 님은 부르면
　반드시 달려온다고!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58006.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>我们还有赞库罗尼大人！
只要我们喊他，
他就会赶来的！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58006.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>我們還有桑克朗大人！
只要我們呼喚他，
他就一定會趕來的！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58007.en:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Hehe... I thought as much <heart> Your trusting hearts
are the source of Zankrone's power, aren't they!<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58007.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「クスクス。そう言うと思ったわ<heart>
　あなたたちの　信じる心が
　ザンクローネの　チカラの源だもんねッ！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58007.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 큭큭큭. 그렇게 말할 줄 알았지<heart>
　당신들의 믿는 마음이
　장크로네의 힘의 원천이잖아!<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58007.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>呵呵。就知道你会这么说<heart>
毕竟你们对他的信任
才是他的力量源泉啊！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58007.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>嘻嘻，就知道你們會這麼說<heart>
你們對桑克朗的信心
就是他力量的來源嘛！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58008.en:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>That's why I came here tonight, you know, to get rid
of those stupid spirits!! I shall teach you the joys
of submission.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58008.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「だから　今日はね
　そのくだらない心を　消しにきたの！！
　私が　服従する喜びを　教えてあげるッ。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58008.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 그래서 오늘은
　그 하찮은 마음을 없애 버리러 왔어!!
　내가 복종의 기쁨을 가르쳐 줄게.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58008.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>所以，我今天就是来消除你们
那些无聊的信任！
教教你们什么是服从的快乐。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58008.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>所以，我今天就要來
消滅你們那種無謂的信任！！
教教你們什麼是服從的快樂！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58009.en: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Eveeeryone, become my seeervants <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58009.ja: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「み～んな　私のしもべに　なりなさ～い<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58009.ko: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 모~두 나의 종이 되어라~<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58009.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>各～位，都变成我的～奴仆吧<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58009.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>所有人～都變成我的奴隸吧～<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58010.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>……魔女……大人。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58010.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>…………魔女……大人。<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58011.en: <start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>Hooray for Miss Witch......<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58011.ja: <start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「魔女様　ばんざーい……。<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58011.ko: <start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>: 마녀님, 만세…….<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58011.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>魔女大人万岁……<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58011.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>魔女大人，萬歲……<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58012.ja: <start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「ザンクローネを……滅ぼせ！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58012.ko: <start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>: 장크로네를…… 없애자!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58012.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>消灭……赞库罗尼！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58012.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>消滅……桑克朗！<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58013.en: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>Kill! Kill! Kill Zankrone!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58013.ja: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「滅ぼせ！　滅ぼせ！　ザンクローネを滅ぼせ！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58013.ko: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>: 없애자! 없애자! 장크로네를 없애자!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58013.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>消灭他！消灭他！消灭赞库罗尼！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58013.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>消滅他！消滅他！消滅桑克朗！<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58014.ja: <start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「こ　こりゃいかん……！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58014.ko: <start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 아, 안 돼……!<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58014.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>这下糟了！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58014.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>這、這下糟了……！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58015.en:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Kyahahahah! And with that, the villagers' are done
believing in Zankrone, aren't they.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58015.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「キャハハハッ！！
　これで　村人たちの希望で　動いている
　ザンクローネは　おしまいね。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58015.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 꺄하하핫!!
　마을 사람들의 희망으로 움직이는
　장크로네는 이제 끝이야.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58015.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哈哈哈哈哈哈！
这样一来，靠村民们的希望才能行动的
赞库罗尼终于要完蛋了。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58015.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哇哈哈哈！！
這樣一來，靠村民的希望才能行動的
桑克朗就完蛋了。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58016.en: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Melsandy Village has no need for heroes... <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58016.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「メルサンディ村に
　英雄なんて　いらないわ……<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58016.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 메르상디 마을에
　영웅 같은 건 필요 없어……<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58016.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>梅尔桑蒂村根本就
不需要什么英雄……<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58016.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>梅爾桑蒂村
根本就不需要什麼英雄……<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58017.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Yo... <pc>, that's you ain't it?<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58017.ja: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「よお……<pc>じゃねえか。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58017.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>哦……这不是<pc>么。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58017.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>喔……這不是<pc>嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58018.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Huh...... She sure is making me look pathetic right
now, huh...<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58018.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「ハァ…………。 
　本当に　お前には　みっともねえとこばっか
　見られちまうな……。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58018.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 하아………….
　정말 너에게는 한심한 모습만
　보여 주게 되는군…….<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58018.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>唉……
总是让你看见我丢人的样子……<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58018.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>唉………… 
總是讓你看見
我丟人的樣子呢……<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58019.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Showing up and turning Melsandy's villages into
puppets, that Witch... Thanks to that, that's how I got
into this mess.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58019.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「メルサンディの村人を　あやつり人形にするとは
　やってくれるぜ　魔女……。
　おかげで　俺は　このザマだよ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58019.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 메르상디 마을 사람들을 꼭두각시로 만들다니
　참 대단한 마녀야…….
　덕분에 내 꼴은 이렇게 됐지.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58019.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>居然操纵了梅尔桑蒂村的村民，
魔女还真有一手……
我现在这副样子就是拜她所赐。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58019.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>竟然操縱了梅爾桑蒂村的居民，
那魔女還真有兩下子……
拜她所賜，我變成這副樣子。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

100770.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Even still... That dear old smell.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
100770.ja: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「それにしても……懐かしい　においだ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
100770.ko: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 그나저나…… 반가운 냄새군.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
100770.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>话说起来……这个气味好让人怀念啊。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
100770.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>話說起來……這個氣味好讓人懷念啊。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58020.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Mind giving me some of that bread you got?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58020.ja: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「お前が持ってるパンを　俺にくれないか？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58020.ko: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 네가 가지고 있는 빵을 내게 주겠어?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58020.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>你的那个面包，能送给我吗？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58020.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>你那個麵包能給我嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58022.ja:
<pc>は　ザンクローネに
ザンクローネパンを　渡した！
58022.zh-Hans:
<pc>把赞库罗尼面包
交给了赞库罗尼！
58022.zh-Hant:
<pc>把桑克朗麵包
交給了桑克朗！

58021.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Right now, the only thing that can give me the
strength I need is that bread you got... Please! Give
it to me.<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58021.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「今　俺にチカラを与えられるのは 
　お前の持っている　そのパンだけだ。
　頼む！　ゆずってくれ。<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58021.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 지금 나에게 힘을 줄 수 있는 건
　네가 가진 그 빵뿐이야.
　부탁한다! 나에게 다오.<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58021.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>现在能带给我力量的
就只有那个面包了。
拜托了！请让给我吧。<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58021.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>如今能帶給我力量的，
就只有那個麵包了。
拜託你！讓給我吧。<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58023.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>...That flavor still packs a punch. My whole body's
burning up.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58023.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「……相変わらず　パンチの効いた味だぜ。
　身体中が　ほてってきやがる。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58023.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: ……여전히 강렬한 맛이군.
　몸속이 후끈해지고 있어.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58023.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……这面包还是那么辣啊。
我觉得全身都暖了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58023.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……這麵包還是這麼辣啊，
我感覺全身都熱起來了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58024.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>To think there's someone other than her who can make
this bread...<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58024.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「あいつ以外に　このパンを 
　作るヤツが　いるなんてな……。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58024.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 그 녀석 이외에 이 빵을
　만드는 녀석이 있었다니…….<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58024.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>除了那家伙以外，
居然还有人会做这种面包……<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58024.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>除了那傢伙以外，
居然還有人會做這種麵包……<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58025.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Hey, do you mind listening to me for a
minute? It's about the past...<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58025.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「なあ　<pc>……
　聞いてくれねえか。遠い昔の話を……<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58025.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 이봐, <pc>……
　잠시 들어 주겠나, 먼 옛날의 이야기를……<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58025.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001><pc>……
你听我说。这是很久以前的事……<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58025.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001><pc>……
你能否聽我說呢？這是很久以前的事……<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58027.en:
<start_lip_sync n02228 _normal m00001>"Spirit of Melsandy Village... Please continue to
protect us..."<stop_lip_animation n02228 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58027.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02228 _normal m00001>「メルサンディ村の精霊さま。 
　これからも　村をお守りください……。<stop_lip_animation n02228 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58027.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02228 _normal m00001>: 메르상디 마을의 정령님.
　앞으로도 마을을 지켜 주세요…….<stop_lip_animation n02228 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58027.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02228 _normal m00001>梅尔桑蒂村的精灵大人，
请一直守护这个村庄……<stop_lip_animation n02228 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58027.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02228 _normal m00001>梅爾桑蒂村的精靈大人， 
請繼續守護這個村莊……<stop_lip_animation n02228 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58028.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>I was originally the spirit enshrined in this rock
that watched over Melsandy Village.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58028.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「俺は　元々　このほこらに祀られた
　メルサンディ村を見守る　精霊だった。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58028.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 난 원래 이 성소에 모셔졌던
　메르상디 마을을 지켜보는 정령이었다.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58028.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>我原本是被供奉在这个祠堂里，
守护梅尔桑蒂村的精灵。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58028.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>我原本是被供奉在這座祠堂裡，
守護梅爾桑蒂村的精靈。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58029.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>But this far-off, tiny shrine had eventually been
long forgotten by the villagers...<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58029.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「だが　村から遠い　小さなほこらは
　長い年月の間に　村人たちからも
　忘れ去られてたのさ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58029.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 하지만 마을에서 먼 작은 성소는
　긴 세월 동안 마을 사람들에게서
　점점 잊혔지.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58029.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>但是这个远离村庄的小祠堂
在漫长的岁月中，
被村民们遗忘了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58029.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>但是，這座遠離村莊的小祠堂，
經歷漫長的歲月
連村民也都遺忘了它。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58030.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Except for this one strange village girl, who'd come
every day to clean and offer bread.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58030.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「たったひとり　毎日のように
　そうじをしにきて　パンを供えてく
　風変わりな村娘をのぞいてな。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58030.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 단 한 사람, 날마다
　청소를 하러 와서 빵을 바치고 가는
　특이한 시골 소녀를 빼고 말이야.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58030.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>除了村里一个奇怪的女孩，
她每天都来这里打扫，
还会摆上面包做供品。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58030.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>除了村裡一個奇特的女孩，
她幾乎每天都來打掃，
還會擺上麵包當作供品。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58031.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>...I thought that I'd thank her.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58031.ja: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「……礼が言いてえと　思ったんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58031.ko: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: ……고맙다는 인사를 하고 싶었어.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58031.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……我很想向她道谢。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58031.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……我想向她道謝。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58032.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>When I came to, I was in human form. I committed a
taboo for spirits, and went to Melsandy Village to
see the girl.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58032.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「気がついたら　人の姿になっちまってた。 
　俺は　精霊の禁忌をおかし 
　娘に会いに　メルサンディ村へ行ったのさ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58032.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 정신을 차려 보니 인간으로 변해 있었다. 
　난 정령의 금기를 어기고
　소녀를 만나러 메르상디 마을로 갔지.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58032.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>结果回过神来，我已经变成了人类的样子。
于是我触犯了精灵的禁忌，
去梅尔桑蒂村见那个女孩了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58032.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>結果回過神來，我已經變成了人類的樣子。 
於是我觸犯精靈的禁忌，
跑到梅爾桑蒂村去找那個女孩了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58033.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>And then, I found that village girl being attacked by
monsters. To save her, I started swing my sword.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58033.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「そしたら　村娘が　魔物に襲われててよ。
　助けるために　はじめて剣を振るったぜ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58033.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 그러다 마물에게 습격받는 그 아이를 발견했고
　구하기 위해 처음으로 검을 들었다.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58033.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>结果碰上那个女孩被怪物袭击。
我为了救她，第一次拿起了剑。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58033.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>結果正好看到她被怪物攻擊，
為了救她，我第一次舉起劍。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58034.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Seeing that, the other villagers came to ask me to
take out monsters.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58034.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「その姿を見ていた　村人たちが
　俺に　魔物退治を頼んできた。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58034.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 그 모습을 지켜본 마을 사람들이
　내게 마물 퇴치를 부탁해 왔어.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58034.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>看到那个场面的村民们
委托我去击退怪物。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58034.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>目擊那個場面的一些村民，
就拜託我去擊退怪物。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58035.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>...It felt good to be depended on. After defeating who
knows how many monsters, the villagers began to call
me a hero.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58035.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「……頼られるのが　うれしくてな。
　いくたびか　剣をふるい　魔物を退けるうちに
　村人たちは　俺を　英雄と呼びはじめたんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58035.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: ……내게 의지해 주는 것이 기뻤지.
　몇 번인가 검을 휘두르고 마물을 무찌르는 사이
　마을 사람들은 날 영웅이라 부르기 시작했다.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58035.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……受人委托让我很高兴。
我也不记得自己挥舞着剑，打退了那些怪物多少次。
而在这个过程中，村民们开始把我称为英雄。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58035.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……受人依靠讓我很高興。
就在我幾次揮劍擊退怪物以後，
村民就開始稱呼我為英雄。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58036.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>And then, one day... That villager girl said something
very strange.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58036.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「そして　ある日のこと……　あの村娘が
　突然　妙なことを言いだしてな。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58036.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 그러던 어느 날…… 그 시골 소녀가
　갑자기 이상한 말을 하기 시작했어.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58036.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>然后有一天……
那个女孩突然和我说了很奇怪的话。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58036.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>然後有一天……那個女孩
突然跟我說了奇怪的話。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58037.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>She said that she wanted me to leave the village...
To live with her somewhere else.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58037.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「娘は　俺に村を捨ててほしいと……
　一緒に　別の場所で暮らそうと願ってきた。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58037.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 그 아이는 나더러 마을을 버려 달라고……
　함께 다른 곳에서 살자고 애원했다.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58037.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>她希望我能舍弃这个村子……
和她一起去别的地方生活。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58037.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>她說，希望我能拋下這個村子……
和她一起到別的地方去生活。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58038.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>But, being the spirit of this land, there was nothing
I could do but coldly push her away...<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58038.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「だが　この地の精霊である俺は 
　それは　できないと　冷たく突き放すしか
　なかったんだよ……。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58038.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 하지만 이 땅의 정령인 나는 
　그럴 수 없다며 차갑게 뿌리칠 수밖에
　없었지…….<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58038.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>但我是属于这个地方的精灵，
我只能无情地推开她，
告诉她这种事我办不到……<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58038.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>但是，我是屬於這個地方的精靈，
因此我只能無情地推開她，
告訴她這種事我辦不到……<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58039.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>...Not long after that, the girl disappeared.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58039.ja: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「……間もなく　あの娘は　姿を消した。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58039.ko: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: ……머지않아 그 소녀는 종적을 감췄다.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58039.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……没过多久，那个女孩就不见了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58039.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……沒過多久，那個女孩就失去蹤影。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58040.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>This shrine is so dirty now, huh...<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58040.ja: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「このほこらも　すっかり汚れちまったな……。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58040.ko: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 이 성소도 그새 많이 지저분해졌군…….<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58040.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>这个祠堂也就再没人打扫过了……<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58040.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>這座祠堂也完全變得髒兮兮的……<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58041.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Hey, thanks for listening. Thanks to this tasty bread,
I'm healthy enough to go.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58041.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「聞いてくれて　ありがとよ。
　うめえパンのおかげで　元気出たぜ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58041.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 얘기를 들어 줘서 고마워.
　맛있는 빵 덕에 기운이 나는군.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58041.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>谢谢你听我说这些。
多亏了那个美味的面包，我又有精神了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58041.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>謝謝你聽我說這些。
多虧了那個美味的麵包，我又有精神了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58042.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>I gotta go after the Witch... See ya.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
